thread.title: Winners of Mega Bridal Make-Up Competition
thread.title_full: Winners of Mega Bridal Make-Up Competition

author: Author
title: Winners of Mega Bridal Make-Up Competition
text:
Mysuru : A Mega Bridal Make-Up Competition Season 2 was organised by Mysore Beauticians Welfare Association (MBWA) at a private hotel in city recently. The event was inaugurated by chief guest Apoorva Rai, Mrs. South Pacific Asia Universe 2023 and former Femina Miss India. Other guests were Ibbani Silju, celebrity makeup artist, Dr. Vidya Pradeep, Cosmetologist, Anush Ali, International makeup artist and Vinattaa Rao, MAC trainer.
The event featured a Masterclass on Muhurtham look makeup by Ibbani Silju prior to the competition. A total of 42 participants took part in the competition. Two hours time was given to participants for the theme ‘Muhurtham look.’
The traditional ‘Muhurtham look’ of Tamil bride, Karnataka bride, Telugu bride, Malayalam bride, Iyengar bride, Muslim bride and North Indian bride too was on show.
The list of prize-winners is as follows:
Rajini Gowda from Mysuru – Winner (Prize – Rs. 30,000 and goodies worth Rs. 5,000); Asha from Kollegal – 1st Runner-up (Prize – Rs. 20,000 and goodies worth Rs. 5,000); Sangeetha Shetty from Mysuru – 2nd Runner-up (Rs. 10,000 and goodies worth Rs. 5,000).
Savitha Malavalli – Best Mehendi; Usha Shankar – Best Eye Makeup; Roopa (Pandavapura) – Best Accessories; Parvathi Kelemane (Mysuru) – Best Saree Draping; Nazia Sharief (Mysuru) – Best Nails.
